text: Oreophrynella (bush toads) is a genus of true toads. They live in southern Venezuela, Guyana and far northern Brazil. ==Species== Binomial Name and Author Common Name Oreophrynella cryptica Oreophrynella dendronastes Oreophrynella huberi Bolivar Bush Toad Oreophrynella macconnelli MacConnell's Bush Toad Oreophrynella nigra Pebble Toad Oreophrynella quelchii Roraima Bush Toad Oreophrynella vasquezi Oreophrynella weiassipuensis ==Other websites== * . 2007.
